option( ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_ZLIB "" ON )
option( HUNTER_ENABLED "" OFF )
option( HUNTER_STATUS_DEBUG "" OFF )
option( HUNTER_STATUS_PRINT "" OFF )
option( HUNTER_TLS_VERIFY "" OFF )
option( IGNORE_GIT_HASH "" OFF )
option( INJECT_DEBUG_POSTFIX "" OFF )
option( RT_LIBRARY "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_ANDROID_JNIIOSYSTEM "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_ASAN "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BIN_INSTALL_DIR "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_EXPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_IMPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_ARCHITECTURE "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_TOOLS "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_COMPILER "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_NONFREE_C4D_IMPORTER "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_BUILD_SAMPLES "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_COVERALLS "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_DOUBLE_PRECISION "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_INSTALL_PDB "" ON )
option( ASSIMP_NO_EXPORT "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_OPT_BUILD_PACKAGES "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_UBSAN "" OFF )
option( ASSIMP_WERROR "" OFF )
option( BUILD_DOCS "" OFF )
option( BUILD_FRAMEWORK "" OFF )


#sets CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY 
#sets CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX
add_subdirectory( assimp )




set_target_properties( assimp PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )

if( TARGET assimp_cmd )
    set_target_properties( assimp_cmd PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )
endif()
set_target_properties( IrrXML PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )
set_target_properties( UpdateAssimpLibsDebugSymbolsAndDLLs PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )
set_target_properties( zlib PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )
set_target_properties( zlibstatic PROPERTIES FOLDER "snakeoil/externals/assimp" )

unset( EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH CACHE )
unset( IGNORE_GIT_HASH CACHE )
unset( INJECT_DEBUG_POSTFIX CACHE )
unset( PKG_CONFIG_EXECUTABLE CACHE )
unset( RT_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( SYSTEM_IRRXML CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ZLIB CACHE )
unset( HUNTER_ENABLE CACHE )

unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ZLIB CACHE )
unset( HUNTER_ENABLED CACHE )
unset( HUNTER_STATUS_DEBUG CACHE )
unset( HUNTER_STATUS_PRINT CACHE )
unset( HUNTER_TLS_VERIFY CACHE )
unset( IGNORE_GIT_HASH CACHE )
unset( INJECT_DEBUG_POSTFIX CACHE )
unset( RT_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_ANDROID_JNIIOSYSTEM CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_ASAN CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BIN_INSTALL_DIR CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_EXPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_IMPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ARCHITECTURE CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_LIBRARY_SUFFIX CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_LIB_INSTALL_DIR CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_PACKAGE_VERSION CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_TOOLS CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_COMPILER CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_NONFREE_C4D_IMPORTER CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_BUILD_SAMPLES CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_COVERALLS CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_DOUBLE_PRECISION CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_INSTALL_PDB CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_NO_EXPORT CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_OPT_BUILD_PACKAGES CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_UBSAN CACHE )
unset( ASSIMP_WERROR CACHE )

unset( BUILD_DOCS CACHE )
unset( BUILD_FRAMEWORK CACHE )
unset( BUILD_SHARED_LIBS CACHE )

unset( DirectX_D3DCOMPILER_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( DirectX_D3DX9_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( DirectX_DXERR_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( DirectX_DXGI_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( DirectX_DXGUID_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( DirectX_INCLUDE_DIR CACHE )
unset( DirectX_LIBRARY CACHE )
unset( LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH CACHE )
unset( LIBRARY_SUFFIX CACHE )
